text:
Note: bug for version 2.0.59 but the bug reporting form does not allow '2.0.59' 
as 'Version'.

If I build OpenSSL and install only its shared libraries, they have a '.sl' 
suffix on HP-UX. Then, when I run Apache's configure, it searches in turn a 
file named libssl.a, libssl.so, and libssl.dylib (line #10818 in 
2.0.59/configure). As I have not installed the static lib files, configure 
wrongly concludes that 'error: OpenSSL libraries not found'.

Workaround : configure should also search for a file named 'libssl.sl', in 
addition to the '.a', '.so', and '.dylib' suffixes.
